### Data library

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(reactable)
library(data.table)

data_cats_tops <- fread("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/uva-bi-sdad/sdc.standards/main/src/data_categories_topics.csv")
reactable(data_cats_tops,
          groupBy = c("RepoName", "DataType", "DataCategory"))
```
